HUAWEI WiFi AX2 (Model: WS7002) Technical Specifications

The Huawei WS7002 is the model designation for the HUAWEI WiFi AX2 router, a Wi-Fi 6 dual-band device designed for home use with gigabit speeds and mesh compatibility.

Physical Specifications

  • Dimensions: 257.6 mm (Width) × 163.5 mm (Depth) × 29 mm (Height)
  • Weight: Approximately 216 g (without packaging)

Wireless Specifications

  • Transmission Standard: 802.11ax/ac/a/n (2 × 2 MIMO on 5 GHz), 802.11b/g/n (2 × 2 MIMO on 2.4 GHz)
  • Wireless Transmission Rate: Up to 300 Mbit/s (2.4 GHz); Up to 1201 Mbit/s (5 GHz); Total up to 1501 Mbit/s
  • Frequency Bands: 2.4 GHz and 5 GHz
  • Key Features: Supports 802.11kv protocol, IPv4/IPv6, Wi-Fi timer, Guest Wi-Fi, device speed limiting, MAC address filtering, parental controls, VPN passthrough, DMZ/virtual server, and WAN connection methods (PPPoE/DHCP/Static IP/Bridge)
  • Security: WPA3 encryption, Wi-Fi access control, Guest Wi-Fi isolation, SSID hiding, firewall, DMZ, and parental controls

Memory

  • RAM: 128 MB
  • ROM: 128 MB

Ports and Buttons

  • Ports: 3 × 10/100/1000 Mbps auto-adaptive WAN/LAN ports; 1 × power port
  • Buttons: 1 × WPS/Reset (2-in-1 multifunction button)
  • Indicators: 1 × LED indicator

Power

  • Power Consumption: Less than 12 W
  • Power Adapter: 12 V DC, 1 A

Environmental Specifications

  • Operating Temperature: 0 °C to 40 °C
  • Storage Temperature: -40 °C to 70 °C
  • Operating Humidity: 5% to 95% RH (non-condensing)
  • Storage Humidity: 5% to 95% RH (non-condensing)

Software and Accessories

  • Management App: HUAWEI AI Life
  • Included Accessories: Power adapter (1), Ethernet cable (1), Quick Start Guide and Safety Information (1), Warranty Card (1)

Note: Specifications are theoretical and may vary slightly by region or firmware updates. Actual performance depends on network conditions and connected devices.
